text:
[Verse]
Night falls light fades
City lights are bright
In the car we escape
Into the starry night

[Verse 2]
Windows down hair flyin'
Music loud I'm high
Dreams in the rearview
Chasing twilight sky

[Chorus]
Moonlit drive we're alive
Feel the rush feel the vibe
Take my hand let's get lost
No regrets no high cost

[Verse 3]
Wind sings soft whispers
Your laughter fills the air
Heartbeats match the rhythm
Electrified we dare

[Chorus]
Moonlit drive we're alive
Feel the rush feel the vibe
Take my hand let's get lost
No regrets no high cost

[Bridge]
No road maps we need
Just your smile and speed
Underneath the heavens
Our wishes intercede
title: Moonlit Drive
